meanings.definition: A group of two persons or things.
meanings.sent1: They always walked to school together as a twosome.
meanings.sent2: The twins were a twosome that everyone admired.
meanings.sent3: The two peas in a pod were the perfect twosome.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a twosome of puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The twosome of best friends shared everything, even their secrets.

meanings.definition: A game or match involving two players or teams.
meanings.sent1: The tennis tournament ended with an exciting twosome.
meanings.sent2: The chess competition was won by a skilled twosome.
meanings.sent3: The twosome on the basketball court showed great teamwork.
meanings.sent4: Their rivalry was like a twosome of fierce competitors.
meanings.sent5: The twosome in the final round played with unmatched determination.
